definitions.definition: A small, exclusive group of individuals, usually according to lifestyle or social status; a cabal .
examples: This school used to be really friendly, but now everyone keeps to their own cliques .

definitions.definition: A subgraph isomorphic to a complete graph .
examples: The problem of finding the largest clique in an arbitrary graph is NP-complete.

definitions.definition: A group of related web sites that link to each other, like a webring but with exclusive membership determined by the clique owner.

main_definition: A small, exclusive group of individuals, usually according to lifestyle or social status; a cabal .
secondary_definitions: ( graph theory ) A subgraph isomorphic to a complete graph .
( Internet ) A group of related web sites that link to each other, like a webring but with exclusive membership determined by the clique owner.
